name: Clin M Cervix
title: Clinical M
notes:
**Note:** When both the Federation Internationale de Gynecologie et d'Obstetrique (FIGO) stage and metastatic detail are available, use the metastatic detail in preference to a statement of FIGO stage - see Registrar notes.
* If the only information is FIGO IIIB, assign the appropriate stage and leave clinical T, N, and M blank

**Distant lymph nodes**

    Aortic, NOS 
        Lateral aortic
        Para-aortic
        Periaortic
    Inguinal (femoral)
    Mediastinal
